markdownRemark.html:
sdkman https://sdkman.io/

sdkman을 이용하면 java와 sbt 버전을 관리할 수 있다. https://mungingdata.com/java/sdkman-multiple-versions-java-sbt-scala/

sdk list java / sdk list sbt / sdk list spark
sdk install java 11.0.13-ms
sdk use java 11.0.13-ms
sdk default java 11.0.13-ms
echo $JAVA_HOME
